description: A game has a width a height that sets how much space the camera shows, and the name of the first scene to be loaded once the game is launched

initialScene.description: Path to the initial scene of the game

hud.description: Path to the default hud for the game

width.description: Game's width (in game units). This height sets how much horizontal space the camera shows

height.description: Game's height (in game units). This height sets how much vertical space the camera shows
